version_description:
- Minor bug fixes.
- Improvement on other usabilities.
- Minor bug fixes.
- Full support for vertical video.
- Bug fixed and improved efficiency.
- Improved log-in process.
- Section has been added where you can watch original video made by Mubeat.
- Mubeat now officially support iOS 12.

- It's easier to see if your videos have subtitles.
- Minor bug fixes.
- Bug fixes and some screen designs have been fixed.
- Corrección de errores menores.
Nuevo servicio premium, Mubeat+ ahora ha lanzado. Con HD y la función de descarga, disfruta del nuevo Mubeat mejorado.

- Se corrigió un error de compra.

--
Nuevo servicio premium, Mubeat+ ahora ha lanzado. Con HD y la función de descarga, disfruta del nuevo Mubeat mejorado
Mejoras menores de servicio y errores han sido actualizados.

Mejoras en Home de Mubeat
Se han agregado nuevos videos, Mubeat Wave y la lista original de Mubeat. ¡Vea los diversos contenidos de Mubeat en Home!

Otros
Corrección de errores y mantenimiento de la aplicación se han mejorado.
Corrección de errores y mantenimiento de la aplicación se han mejorado.
Corrección de errores y mantenimiento de la aplicación se han mejorado.
Bug fixes and app maintenance have been improved.
Bug fixes and app maintenance have been improved.

Player Improvement:
Changes to the bottom part of the player menu have been made. Now you can request subtitles for videos without subtitles!

Feedback Improvement:
A feedback icon has been added to the upper part of My Page. Send us your thoughts on service improvements, bug reports and more!

Other:
Bug fixes and app maintenance have been improved.
Bug fixes and app maintenance have been improved.
Bug fixes and app maintenance have been improved.
Bug fixes and app maintenance have been improved.
Bug fixes and app maintenance have been improved.

Auto subtitles have been enhanced.
---
Version 1.5.0:
Beats Launch
- Beats, points that can be used in Mubeat, has been launched. Obtain Heart Beats and Star Beats and use them in fandom projects!

Opened Fandom Project Service
- You can now run special ads for artists in Mubeat! Commemorate and celebrate artist's various anniversaries such as birthdays, comebacks, debut anniversaries, and more with other fans using Mubeat fandom ad!

Other
- Error causing small subtitles in videos has been fixed.
- Error preventing image upload has been fixed.
- iOS 13 support and minor bug fixes.

Artist Channel User Ranking
- Users active on artist channel can now see their ranking! Ranking will increase according to number of videos watched, fandom ad participation, etc and consistent activity on the artist channel followed will result in higher ranking.
Participating in fandom ad, fandom ad screens, and more have been improved.

Launch of Voting Service
- Vote for your favorite artists and videos, and check the rankings in real time.
- Voting can be done using Heart Beats.

Additional uses of Beats: You can now use the following services with Beats.
- Video download: Is there a video you love? Download it with Beats now!
- HD streaming: No more low-quality videos! Watch crystal clear 1080P videos with Beats now!

Other
- Error affecting the size of auto-generated subtitles has been fixed.
Bug fixes and app maintenance have been improved.
Bug fixes and app maintenance have been improved.
Bug fixes and app maintenance have been improved.

- Mini player and bottom tab switching errors have been fixed.
- Ad viewing error has been fixed.

Version 1.9.3:
- Bug fixes and app maintenance have been improved.

Version 1.9.2:
- Mini player and bottom tab switching errors have been fixed.
- Ad viewing error has been fixed.

Additional category for obtaining free Heart Beats
- Offerwall mission category has been added. Complete missions in the Mubeat Store and get free Heart Beats!

Additional Voting Category
- Song voting function has been added. Vote for your favorite artist's song and increase their rank!
Bug fixes and app maintenance have been improved.

Beat Box Service Opened
- Beat Box is now activated on the artist's channel who came in 1st in Vote>Mubeat tab>Mubeat Vote!
- Participate in Beat Box and get Heart Beats.

Other
- Issues regarding video ad playback and other minor services have been fixed and improved.

Voting Improvement:
- You can now vote for your favorite artist more conveniently. Improvements made to the voting pop-up allows you to submit multiple votes at once!

Other:
- Issues regarding video ad playback and other minor services have been fixed and improved.

Additional Log In Service:
- Apple ID log in function has been added.

Other:
- Issues regarding video ad playback and other minor services have been fixed and improved.

Additional Log In Service:
- Apple ID log in function has been added.

Voting Certificate Function Added:
- Click on the certificate icon after voting! You can get a certificate on your voting details.

- Error affecting the size of auto-generated subtitles has been fixed.
- Issues regarding video ad playback and other minor services have been fixed and improved.

Display Board Service Opened:
ㆍDisplay board function has been added in the voting page. Support your artist with the display board!

Other:
ㆍMubeat+ user: Video playing error while using AirPlay mirroring function have been fixed.
ㆍBug fixes and minor services have been improved.

Display Board Service Opened:
ㆍDisplay board function has been added in the voting page. Support your artist with the display board!

Other:
ㆍError preventing image upload has been fixed.
ㆍMubeat+ user: Video playing error while using AirPlay mirroring function have been fixed.
ㆍBug fixes and minor services have been improved.

New Ad Project Area Added:
ㆍVideo ad function has been added in the Mubeat Store. Advertise your favorite artist's video now!

Ad Project Improvement:
ㆍSearch function has been added to the ongoing and closed projects pages.

Artist Channel Improvement:
ㆍAd project button has been added to the artist channel. You can now check out the list of ongoing projects by clicking this button!

Other:
ㆍBug fixes and minor services have been improved.

Version 1.14.1 Service Improvement:
ㆍBug fixes and minor services such as ad viewing etc have been improved.

Artist Channel Improvement:

New Ad Project Area Added:

Ad Project Improvement:
• Ad areas are now separated by tabs. Find projects you are looking for more conveniently according to the respective ad areas.

Mubeat Global Choice Awards with Gaon Voting Service Opened:
• Vote for the 10th Gaon Chart Awards 2020's "Global Choice Awards category" on Mubeat!
• Acquiring voting tickets will be available from 23rd November (KST), so don't forget to start collecting tickets then.
